name: autoscroll-block
description: A WordPress Gutenberg block for automatic page scrolling
author: iconick

scripts.build:dist: npm run build && npm run copy:dist
scripts.copy:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r build/* dist/ && cp smooth-operator.php block.json readme.txt dist/ && find dist -name '*.map' -delete 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.watch:dist: npm run build:dist && npm run watch
